files.description: Defines /outputs artifact rules, naming conventions, and a 'ship every cycle' checklist to ensure deterministic, auditable deliverables each iteration.
Provides the seed deliverable roadmap outlining planned /outputs artifacts, milestones, and acceptance criteria for the Python script implementation mission.

missionDescription: Create and commit the first two artifacts immediately: /outputs/README.md (artifact rules + naming conventions + 'ship every cycle' checklist) and one seed deliverable (e.g., /outputs/roadmap_v1.md or /outputs/bibliography_system.md) in the same cycle.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Identifies the core execution blocker (no persistent artifacts). Without shipping outputs each cycle, the comprehensive literature survey cannot accumulate into usable knowledge, proofs, examples, or ...
